original_text:
Guns N’ Roses
Grandi classici della storia rock

Welcome to the Jungle, November Rain, Patience e It’s so Easy, sono solo alcune delle canzoni dei Guns ’n Roses diventate leggendarie e conosciute pressoché in ogni angolo del globo. Il gruppo fondato da Axl Rose, Slash e Duff è considerato da molti la più grande rock band esistente, una vera macchina da guerra soprattutto nella dimensione live.
Non a caso la schermata principale è un grande palco con la griglia di gioco al centro e il logo della band sullo sfondo, con ogni simbolo che richiama all’immaginario creato dal gruppo. A impreziosire ancor di più il gioco ci sono estratti video dei concerti che vengono mostrati in occasioni di Bonus e vincite speciali. E poi c’è la colonna sonora, composta da cinque hits, tra cui Welcome to the Jungle, canzone manifesto del gruppo, November Rain e Paradise City.
Caratteristiche della slot
La slot ha delle caratteristiche classiche, a partire dalla grandezza della griglia, con 5 rulli e 3 righe. Le linee di pagamento sono 20 e fisse. Ogni Spin costa 0,20 €, con diversi livelli di puntata. La scommessa può essere innalzata a piacimento e con il tasto Max Bet si può impostare il livello massimo con un solo click. Tra le varie funzioni c’è l’Autoplay che ci permette di impostare tra i 10 e i 1.000 giri automatici.
La volatilità è bassa, mentre il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è del 96,98%.
Appetite for Destruction Feature
Come detto in precedenza, in Guns n’ Roses tutti simboli riportano all’immaginario della band. Se quelli che valgono meno sono le carte da gioco decorati con le rose, per vincere cifre di livello è necessario puntare ai plettri dei dischi Use Your Illusion II e Lies, per non parlare delle immagini di Axl Rose, Slash e Duff.
Il piatto succulento è però servito con i vari Bonus, a partire dai due Wild, normale e a espansione, che sostituiscono tutti i simboli eccetto gli altri speciali.
Il vinile è il nostro Bonus. Se ne atterrano almeno tre durante uno Spin, vedremo apparire un lp su un giradischi e in base a l punto in cui si fermerà la puntina, vinceremo un gioco speciale:
– Encore Free Spins: attiva dieci Free Spins in cui i membri della band diventano Wild a espansione.
– Crowd Pleaser Bonus Game: è un bonus suddiviso in tre livelli che ricompensa con Free Spins e monete
– Coin Wins: con questo Bonus si possono ottenere ricompense monetarie immediate.
Ci sono altre funzioni extra come l’Appetite for Destruction Wild, un Jolly casuale a forma di croce che regala vincite stratosferiche, o il Legend Spin, in cui i membri della band diventano Wild espandibili.

Domande Frequenti 
L’RTP di questa slot è soddisfacente?

Assolutamente! Siamo vicini al 97%, tra i più alti che possiamo trovare!



Cosa significa che la volatilità è bassa ?

Significa che si vince abbastanza di frequente ma i premi non hanno altissimo valore.



Posso giocare anche dai miei dispositivi mobili ?

Certamente! Guns ‘n Roses è progettata per girare in maniera fluida su qualsiasi dispositivo.

raw_translation.response:
"Guns N' Roses" 

A classic history of rock

Welcome to the Jungle, November Rain, Patience, and It's so Easy are just a few of the legendary songs by Guns 'n Roses, known and loved all over the world. This band, founded by Axl Rose, Slash, and Duff, is considered by many to be the greatest rock band of all time, especially in their live shows. 

As expected, the main screen is a big stage in the center of the game grid, with the band's logo in the background and symbols recalling the band's iconic imagery. In addition, there are video excerpts of concerts that are shown during bonuses and special wins, making the game even more exciting. And then there is the soundtrack, consisting of five hits, including Welcome to the Jungle, the band's signature song, November Rain, and Paradise City.

Slot features

The slot features classic gameplay, starting with the size of the grid, with 5 reels and 3 rows. There are 20 fixed paylines, with each spin costing €0.20, with different levels of betting. The bet can be raised at will, and with the Max Bet button, the maximum level can be set with just one click. Among the various features is Autoplay, allowing you to set between 10 and 1,000 automatic spins. The volatility is low, while the theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.98%.

Appetite for Destruction Feature

As mentioned earlier, in Guns n' Roses, all symbols refer to the band's imagery. While the ones worth the least are the playing cards decorated with roses, high-level wins require aiming for picks from Use Your Illusion II and Lies, not to mention the images of Axl Rose, Slash, and Duff. 

The juicy part, however, is served with the various bonuses, including two Wilds, normal and expanding, which replace all symbols except the other specials. The Bonus symbol is a vinyl. If three or more of them land during a spin, an lp will appear on a turntable, and according to where the needle stops, we can win a special game: 

- Encore Free Spins: activates ten Free Spins in which members of the band become expanding Wilds. 
- Crowd Pleaser Bonus Game: a bonus divided into three levels that rewards with Free Spins and coins. 
- Coin Wins: with this Bonus, you can get immediate monetary rewards. 

There are other extra features such as the Appetite for Destruction Wild, a random cross-shaped Joker that awards astronomical wins, or the Legend Spin, where the band members become expanding Wilds.

FAQs 

Is the RTP of this slot satisfying?

Absolutely! We are close to 97%, which is one of the highest ones we can find!

What does low volatility mean?

It means that you win fairly often, but the prizes are not of the highest value.

Can I also play from my mobile devices?

Certainly! Guns 'n Roses is designed to run smoothly on any device.

Review:
 
Game Description

Guns N' Roses is an online slot game featuring a 5-reel, 3-row grid with 20 fixed paylines. The game is inspired by the iconic rock band Guns N' Roses, with every symbol recalling the group's imagery. The game features classic slot elements like autoplay, variable betting, wild symbols, and bonus games. The soundtrack includes five legendary hits from Guns N' Roses, including Welcome to the Jungle and November Rain.

Gameplay Features

Guns N' Roses offers an engaging and immersive gameplay experience. The game features a low volatility and a theoretical RTP of 96.98%, making it attractive to players who enjoy frequent wins. The game has a wide range of betting levels, and the Autoplay feature allows players to set up between 10 and 1,000 automatic spins. The Expanding Wild and Appetite for Destruction Wild features offers players the chance to score big wins and the Legend Spin feature transforms band members into expanding wilds.

Symbol Value

In Guns N' Roses, players can score big wins by landing high-value symbols like Axl Rose, Slash, and Duff, as well as the picks of the Use Your Illusion II and Lies albums. Lower value symbols include cards adorned with roses. The vinyl record symbol triggers the game's bonus features, including Encore Free Spins, Coin Wins, and the Crowd Pleaser Bonus Game.

Bonus Features

The vinyl record symbol is the key to unlocking Guns N' Roses' bonus features. If players land at least three of these symbols in one spin, they will trigger a bonus game. The game includes Encore Free Spins, which activate ten free spins in which the band members become expanding wilds; Coin Wins, which offers immediate monetary rewards; and the Crowd Pleaser Bonus Game, which is divided into three levels and rewards players with free spins and coins. Other features include the Appetite for Destruction Wild, a random cross-shaped wildcard that rewards players with sky-high winnings, and the Legend Spin, in which the band members transform into expanding wilds.

Soundtrack and Graphics

Guns N' Roses is designed to be a visually stunning game, featuring a big stage with the game grid in the center and the band's logo in the background. The game's symbols recall the iconic imagery created by the group, while video clips of concerts are shown during bonus and special wins. The game's soundtrack includes five hits from Guns N' Roses, including Welcome to the Jungle, November Rain, and Paradise City, making it a must-play for fans of rock music.

Review: "Guns N' Roses" - Rock history's greatest classics

Welcome to the Jungle, November Rain, Patience, and It's So Easy are just some of the legendary songs of Guns N' Roses, known and loved around the globe. Founded by Axl Rose, Slash, and Duff, they are considered to be the greatest rock band ever, especially in the live dimension. It's no wonder that the main screen is a big stage with the game grid in the center and the band's logo in the background, with every symbol recalling the iconic imagery created by the group. To make the game even more special, there are video clips of concerts shown during bonus and special wins. And then there's the soundtrack, composed of five hits, including Welcome to the Jungle, the group's manifesto song, November Rain, and Paradise City. 

Slot Features 
The slot embodies classic features, starting with the size of the grid, with 5 reels and 3 rows. The paylines are 20 and fixed, with each spin costing 0.20 € and various betting levels available. The bet can be raised as desired, and the Max Bet button allows for the maximum level to be set with just one click. Among the various features is Autoplay, which allows the player to set between 10 and 1,000 automatic spins. The volatility is low, with a theoretical return to player (RTP) of 96.98%. 

Appetite for Destruction Feature 
As previously mentioned, all symbols in Guns N' Roses evoke the band's imagery. While the cards adorned with roses are the lower value symbols, to win high amounts, players will want to focus on the picks of the Use Your Illusion II and Lies albums, not to mention the images of Axl Rose, Slash, and Duff. The real goodies, however, come from the various bonuses, starting with the two Wilds, normal and expanding, which substitute for all symbols except other special ones. 

The vinyl record is our bonus. If at least three land during a spin, an LP will appear on a turntable and, depending on where the needle stops, players can win a special game: 
- Encore Free Spins: activates ten free spins in which the band members become expanding wilds. 
- Crowd Pleaser Bonus Game: a bonus divided into three levels, rewarding players with free spins and coins. 
- Coin Wins: this bonus offers immediate monetary rewards. 
Other extra features include the Appetite for Destruction Wild, a random cross-shaped wildcard that rewards players with sky-high winnings, and the Legend Spin, in which the band members transform into expanding wilds. 

FAQs 
Is the RTP of this slot satisfying? 

Absolutely! We're close to 97%, one of the highest percentages you can find! 

What does it mean that the volatility is low? 

It means that players can win fairly often, but the prizes aren't very high. 

Can I play on my mobile devices? 

Of course! Guns N' Roses is designed to run smoothly on any device.
